def left_rotate(s):
    s = s[-1]+s[:-1]
    s = s.lstrip('0')
    return s
 
def right_rotate(s):
    s = s[1:]+s[0]
    s = s.lstrip('0')
    return s
 
t = int(raw_input())
while t :
    t=t-1
    n = raw_input()
    ans = max(int(left_rotate(right_rotate(n))),int(right_rotate(left_rotate(n))))
    temp = n[:]
    for i in range(len(n)) :
        temp = left_rotate(temp)
        ans = max(ans,int(temp))
    temp = n[:]
    for i in range(len(n)) :
        temp = right_rotate(temp)
        ans = max(ans,int(temp))
    print ans
